description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Moral Plays; viz. Keep your Temper! or Know whom you marry; a comedy; the Fate of Ivan, an historical tragedy [each in five acts and in prose]; and Miss Betsy Bull, or the Johnnies in Spain, a melodrama [in three acts and prose]. By a Lady [who subscribes herself H. St. A. K., i.e. H. St. A. Kitching]" Author: K., H. St. A. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11781.f.36.", "British Library HMNTS 11779.cc." Page: 2 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1832 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001916959 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
